objects.name: Analytic 0401
objects.description: Unexpected processes (e.g., bash, python, custom binaries) dynamically loading libcrypto or performing AES/RC4 encryption operations, then initiating outbound sessions with abnormal byte entropy or asymmetric traffic patterns.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve or socket/connect system calls from processes using crypto libraries

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: System daemons initiating encrypted sessions with unexpected destinations

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:osquery
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Process linked with libcrypto.so making external connections

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Baseline expected crypto libraries to suppress false positives.
Ratio of sent/received bytes indicating possible hidden C2.
